00037 #ifndef EGS_PRISM_
00038 #define EGS_PRISM_

00041 #include "egs_polygon.h"
00042 #include "egs_functions.h"

00104 template <class T>
00105 class EGS_PRISM_EXPORT EGS_PrismT : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00106 
00107 protected:
00108 
00109     T      *p;             
00110     EGS_Vector a;          
00111     EGS_Float
00112        d1, 
00113        d2; 
00114 
00115     bool   open; 
00116 
00117 public:
00118 
00124     EGS_PrismT(T *P, const string &Name="") :
00125         EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), p(P), a(p->getNormal()), open(true) {
00126         is_convex = p->isConvex();
00127     };
00128 
00135     EGS_PrismT(T *P, EGS_Float D1, EGS_Float D2, const string &Name="") :
00136         EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), p(P), a(p->getNormal()),
00137         d1(D1), d2(D2), open(false) {
00138         if( d1 > d2 ) { d1 = D2; d2 = D1; }
00139         is_convex = p->isConvex();
00140     };
00141 
00143     ~EGS_PrismT() { delete p; };
00144 
00145     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00146         if( !open ) {
00147             EGS_Float d = p->distance(x);
00148             if( d < d1 || d > d2 ) return false;
00149         }
00150         return p->isInside2D(x);
00151     };
00152 
00153     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00154         if( isInside(x) ) return 0; else return -1;
00155     };
00156     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) { return isWhere(x); };
00157 
00158     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00159                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed = 0, EGS_Vector *normal = 0) {
00160         EGS_2DVector v;
00161         EGS_2DVector *pv = normal ? &v : 0;
00162         if( open ) {
00163             bool hit = p->howfar2D(ireg == 0 ? true : false,x,u,t,pv);
00164             if( !hit ) return ireg;
00165             if( newmed ) *newmed = !ireg ? -1 : med;
00166             if( normal ) *normal = p->getNormal(v);
00167             return !ireg ? -1 : 0;
00168         }
00169         EGS_Float up = a*u, d = p->distance(x);
00170         if( !ireg ) { // inside
00171             EGS_Float tt = 1e30; int inew = ireg;
00172             if( up > 0 ) tt = (d2 - d)/up; else tt = (d1 - d)/up;
00173             if( tt <= t ) {
00174                 t = tt; inew = -1;
00175                 if( normal ) *normal = up>0 ? a*(-1) : a;
00176                 if( newmed ) *newmed = -1;
00177             }
00178             bool hit = p->howfar2D(true,x,u,t,pv);
00179             if( !hit ) return inew;
00180             if( newmed ) *newmed = -1;
00181             if( normal ) *normal = p->getNormal(v);
00182             return -1;
00183         }
00184         if( d < d1 || d > d2 ) {
00185             EGS_Float tt = 1e30;
00186             if( d < d1 && up > 0 ) tt = (d1 - d)/up;
00187             else if( d > d2 && up < 0 ) tt = (d2 - d)/up;
00188             if( tt < t ) {
00189                 EGS_Vector xp(x + u*tt);
00190                 if( p->isInside2D(xp) ) {
00191                     t = tt; if( newmed ) *newmed = med;
00192                     if( normal ) *normal = up>0 ? a*(-1) : a;
00193                     return 0;
00194                 }
00195             }
00196         }
00197         EGS_Float tt = t;
00198         bool hit = p->howfar2D(false,x,u,tt,pv);
00199         if( !hit ) return ireg;
00200         d = p->distance(x+u*tt);
00201         if( d >= d1 && d <= d2 ) {
00202             t = tt; if( newmed ) *newmed = med;
00203             if( normal ) *normal = p->getNormal(v);
00204             return 0;
00205         }
00206         return ireg;
00207     };
00208 
00209     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00210         EGS_Float tperp = p->hownear2D(ireg == 0 ? true : false,x);
00211         if( open ) return tperp;
00212         EGS_Float d = p->distance(x);
00213         if( !ireg ) { // inside
00214             EGS_Float t = d2 - d;
00215             if( t < tperp ) tperp = t;
00216             t = d - d1;
00217             if( t < tperp ) tperp = t;
00218         }
00219         else {
00220             EGS_Float t;
00221             if( d < d1 ) t = d1 - d;
00222             else if( d > d2 ) t = d - d2;
00223             else return tperp;
00224             if( p->isInside2D(x) ) tperp = t;
00225             else tperp = sqrt(tperp*tperp + t*t);
00226         }
00227         return tperp;
00228     };
00229 
00230     //const string &getType() const { return type; };
00231     const string &getType() const { return p->getType(); };
00232 
00233     void printInfo() const {
00234         EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00235         if( open ) egsInformation("  open\n");
00236         else egsInformation("  closed with planes at %g and %g\n",d1,d2);
00237         egsInformation("===================================================\n");
00238     };
00239 
00240 };
00241 
00243 typedef EGS_PrismT<EGS_PolygonYZ> EGS_PrismX;
00245 typedef EGS_PrismT<EGS_PolygonXZ> EGS_PrismY;
00247 typedef EGS_PrismT<EGS_PolygonXY> EGS_PrismZ;
00249 typedef EGS_PrismT<EGS_Polygon> EGS_Prism;

00251 #endif
